text: Visitor identification requires us to develop in Java, which is quite troublesome. Can it be done with just the Mobile SDK?

For visitor identification to be secure, the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/private-apps|private app> access token that is POSTed to create the visitor's token must be kept server-side. If the access token is put into mobile application or FE code it can be found and used by other parties.
